DOC.brief_summary: This study examine supplement Shroom Tech Sport ( STS ) affect body composition different performance health measure course 12 week . The supplement combine concurrent training regime consist resistance high intensity interval training . Subjects test percent body fat determine body composition . Further , also test maximal strength ( squat bench ) , maximal power output fatigue , lactate threshold maximal oxygen volume consumption ( VO2max ) . And finally , subject test health hormone marker blood . All measure compare placebo group participate exercise intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Shroom Tech Sport Supplementation Concurrent Training
DOC.criteria: 1. participate 34 week supplement wash prior begin experiment ( except basic protein supplement multivitamin ) 2. least 1 year recreational exercise minimum three time week 1 . Prior steroid use 2 . History tumor 3 . Preexisting musculoskeletal disorder
DOC.keyword: Multi-ingredient performance supplement , High Intensity Interval Training , Concurrent training
